title: Zawlnei hrilh lawk angin Lal Krista chu
lyrics:
Zawlnei hril lawk angin Lal Krista chu
A piang Bethlehem-ah
I lawm ang u, leia hnam tinrengin,
Lal Imanuela chu.

Van mipuiten Bethlehem tlang chungah,
An awi van Lal fa chu;
"Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Leiah rem leng se," an ti.

Beramputen an beram ven laiin,
Lal tirhkoh ropui chuan,
"Bethlehem-ah Chhandamtu a piang ta,
An hnenah kal r'u," an ti.

Vana arsi eng ropui tak chuan,
Khawchhak mi fingte chu,
An hruai zel a, Bethlehem tlang thlengin,
Chutin an ro a an pe a.
